attributes.action: Make Face Coverings Optional In Enclosed Places.
attributes.additional_details: Because I feel like the government are forcing the public into wearing something that isn't backed by any science and is unhygienic (depending on length of time). And also singles out exempt people causing them to get funny looks or bullied while doing there weekly shop. I don't think it is right by forcing people to wear them.
attributes.background: Make Face Coverings Optional rather than mandatory so that people with disabilities don't feel like there in the wrong and getting criticism from other citizens when they are legally exempt.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You might wish to sign one of these petitions:

Don't make the wearing of face masks compulsory in public places in England

Make the use of masks on public transport voluntary and not mandatory
